plot: Laura is a Mexican young actress striving to reach stardom. This musical joins her in her adventure to pursue her dream to become famous. At the end is a story of persistence, faith and positivism.
title: Esa De Rojo
plot_es: Laura is a Mexican young actress striving to reach stardom. This musical joins her in her adventure to pursue her dream to become famous. At the end is a story of persistence, faith and positivism.
